A C D G I O S T

A

applySecurity(VerticalCommand, boolean) - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
if this method returns true security will be applied.

C

ConfigurableTokenProvider - Interface in org.logica.ctis.security
This interface extends the basic TokenProvider interface by adding the init() method that is invoked only once just after the TokenProvider instantiation and gives it access to Profile configurations
ConfigurableTokenValidator - Interface in org.logica.ctis.security
This interface extends the basic TokenValidator interface by adding the init() method that is invoked only once just after the TokenValidator instantiation and gives it access to Profile configurations
CTIS_SECURITY_SERVICE - Static variable in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
 
CTIS_TOKEN_PROVIDER_CLASS - Static variable in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
classname of a TokenProvider to be used
CTIS_TOKEN_VALIDATOR_CLASS - Static variable in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
classname of a TokenValidator to be used
CTIS_TRUSTED_AGENT_NAMES - Static variable in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
Use in combination with a TokenValidator.

D

DummyTokenValidator - Class in org.logica.ctis.security
 
DummyTokenValidator() - Constructor for class org.logica.ctis.security.DummyTokenValidator
 

G

getCommandFilter(boolean) - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService

I

init(Profile) - Method in interface org.logica.ctis.security.ConfigurableTokenProvider
 
init(Profile) - Method in interface org.logica.ctis.security.ConfigurableTokenValidator
 
init(Profile) - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.OwnerBasedTokenProvider
 
init(AgentContainer, Profile) - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
In this init the TokenValidator or TokenProvider is initialized, as well as the SecurityService.trustedAgents.
isMandatory() - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
 
isValid(String, VerticalCommand, AID) - Method in class org.logica.ctis.security.DummyTokenValidator
 
isValid(String, VerticalCommand, AID) - Method in interface org.logica.ctis.security.TokenValidator
 

O

org.logica.ctis.security - package org.logica.ctis.security
This simple SecurityService facilitates security for VerticalCommands, for example making sure only agents with a token that can be validated will be allowed to join the Jade Platform.
OwnerBasedTokenProvider - Class in org.logica.ctis.security
 
OwnerBasedTokenProvider() - Constructor for class org.logica.ctis.security.OwnerBasedTokenProvider
 

S

SecurityService - Class in org.logica.ctis.security
This simple SecurityService facilitates security for VerticalCommands, for example making sure only agents with a token that can be validated will be allowed to join the Jade Platform.
SecurityService() - Constructor for class org.logica.ctis.security.SecurityService
 

T

TokenProvider - Interface in org.logica.ctis.security
Implementors can for example follow a login procedure to retreive a token (sessionid,...) for the arguments.
TokenValidator - Interface in org.logica.ctis.security
Implementors can for example call a isValid(token) function of an external LDAP.
